tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First time when I went for consultation,Dr Elagovan explained my tooth issues very clearly.
I got a confident that I will be recovered soon by his treatment.He is very professional in his treatments and very friendly for approaching our queries. So many Dental care clinic I went for my treatment in last 2 years but I didn't take any risk of taking the treatment with them without gaining the confident about that doctor.In DT SMILE CARE with Dr.Elagovan I am very satisfied and I have done with my treatments .

Thank you so much Dr.Elagovan for your wonderful services.Stay blessed.
reply_text:
Thank you very much mam... We are greatly motivated by your words and shall definitely do our best to live up to your expectations...
Regards

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
************  ** * ******.I had a bad dental experience  from another dentist doctor.I suffered alot.unbearable pain.. Dr.Elangovan diagnosed  the issue and finally cured me..Doctor's  specialist  is handling  procedures or surgeries without pain.He takes care of the patients  after treatments 
through telephone enquiry from the clinic by sisters .My whole  family members r patients  of Doctor only.. Dr.Rekha is an experienced  doctor who helps or assist to manage patients with him.Both the doctors smiling faces gives me energy. Dr.Elangovan always takes the fear of dental procedures from the patients.He handles patients in a smooth way with one by one procedures.Dr.Elangovan is a very talented,intelligent person with humanity..value for time and health with nominal fees..Doctor u r very great üëçThank you so much
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your kind and encouraging words madam.
It‚Äôs a great pleasure to offer our professional services and we shall do our best all the time 
Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
i went first time on emergency & i was accommodated in place of some one who had not reported. the minimum (kind of first aid) required job was performed on my dentures for a reasonable amount. he explained in detail, the problems i have, the alternatives available & ideal solution. i agreed though it was costly because i realised the gravity of the problems.
he was kind enough to give me appointment to suiy my duty pattern. ist stage of surgery was performed to my satisfaction today (7th july).
i think i can safely recommend his service to my friends.
reply_text:
Thank you sir for your heartfelt genuine feedback.
We shall put in our combined expertise to offer you the best outcome of treatment

review: The Dr.s polite attitude is his greatest boon which is magnanimously passed on to us. This attitude makes us feel at ease even during the process of treatment.my daughter had come for impacted canine both sides.the journey of the treatment was very smooth with negligible discomfort even during the surgical procedure. Our whole family of five people including a 90 year old is safely under the cosy care and expert guidance of doctor.in fact extraction of teeth and  providing a particular clip for the nonegerian was wonderfully done by our expert doctor.we wish the doctor a very successful future in all walks of life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Feedback on Dr. T. ELANGIVAN.

Known the Doctor for the past nine years. Friendly, Caring, record maintenance and proper follow up are a few attributes with the doctor in my opinion. Taking every step thinking that the treatment has to be done for himself and at the same time helps to improve the other team doctors' performance. Otherwards, we can call it as he has the highest spirit of empathy.

Sincerely, 
J.Ramesh,
Retd. Manager, SBI.

I thank him for his service and wish him a long career. God bless him always.

Great response from the  Dr.Ilangovan,
 When I called him for appointment, one day before Diwali, renovation work  was undertaken in his clinic, inspite of his ongoing renovation work, he has listened my request, taken  special efforts to attend me, for my urgency,  done an emergency  filling in my tooth, without  charging any amount, and made me ready to celebrate Diwali  Festival. review: I was a bit hesitant first time when I came here as my experience with my previous dentist was not very good. But to honestly say the day when I came here till today I really feel very comfortable n confident for having come here.Thank you Doctor for rendering us such a wonderful service with your humble gesture.Thanks once again.

It was really nice and I was feeling comfortable with the treatment has a two years course here and I really find this treatment useful for me even my brother had treatment here he and I had better results while wearing the braces so they really take care of it teeth it was really awesome

Overall experience was really I had my braces since 1.5 years I had to travel so got my treatment delayed but I am now I got what I wanted my teeth looks perfect after this braces treatment. 5 star for that and ambience doctors always been nice and I had a good relationship. I will recommend my friends and family to visit. Thanks Elangovan.

I had a very good briefing from the Doctor whenI visited him for general check up.I had tooth filling treatment.It was a wonderful experience in getting two of my teeth filled.My heartfelt thanks to him and to his team.My Best wishes to the Team.

The service was very good but the cost of treatment is little costly.I am very satisfied with the treatment and i vl suggest my friends and relatives to your clinic. Dr. Elangovan the best doctor and please do continue your service. I am very happy because each and every process for my treatment was explained clearly. I like the way the doctor and staff move with patients in friendly manner. Thank you soo much..

Treatment was carried out very professionally & friendly. Very good and clam atmosphere. Necessary requirements like x-ray, etc all are available at the clinic to ensure there is no roaming around for additional tests kind of requirements. 

Doctor's experience clearly comes out very well in handling the patients carefully and making them very comfortable and makes painless exercise.

Much satisfied and feeling awesome with the treatment and doctor's approach towards my son..  explained all details on the treatment clearly.
Will surely recommend to all my friends and relatives. ..
Thank you so much doctor ...i am now feeling relaxed and happy  towards my kid's dental health.
Thanks a lot!

Very good. I and my entire family takes treatment here. We trust him much than any other Doctors. Dr. Elangovan is very friendly, attentive, and the best doctor. Yes, most of the time he himself identifies the problem and provides treatment. Treatment is effective and I would recommend this centre to be the best I ever visited.  Thanks.

I know doc for about 5 years. He seems to be the same both by appearance and by character. Meaning he is young always : P . About the treatment as usual nothing bad to say. He has been a good friend to me more than doc. Ms.Rekha too is pleasing . :) u can always drop in here with full trust. Nothing to doubt or worry about if ur in the wrong place to show it teeth. U r absolutely in the rite place. :)

Dr.Elangovan has always treated my dental problems in a gentle and patient way. His humble kind and friendly approach has always made me feel welcome to his clinic. He is a boon to the society. I pray that may God grant him a long healthy peaceful and happy life. May he continue his good work forever.

Right from the reception and until the exit, every thing was excellent.

Everybody given the same priority and Doctor spends more quality time while listening, performing the procedure and also while giving advises.

Good atmosphere and a cool and pleasant waiting area.

On the whole you are coming out with great satisfaction and"A SMILE", HAVING MET ONE OF YOUR FAMILY MEMBER.

Of course to view a good program on the LCD TV

I know Dr Elangovan for the last 12 to 13 years. He is an excellent dentist and a gem of a person. As a Transplant surgeon, I always envy his bedside manner and haven't seen someone better than him in making the patient comfortable. He is extremely kind hearted and very humble person. I would always recommend him to anyone who needs a dental treatment. 


Dr Abdul Rahman
HPB and Transplant Surgeon 
Cambridge, UK

The treatment  is good. But the payment process is little costly..The doctor is very friendly ..And the treatment is on time..Even I recommend my friends and my relatives for their treatment to your clinic..After coming to your clinic I see some changes.. Thanks for your friendly and good treatment..

Verylgood 

Very friendly and polite.the problem was explained to me in detail and alternative treatment was also suggested by the doctor.the doctor used to take so much care so that I never felt any pain or uneasiness during any of my sitting.thanks a lot.

Very good, considering the list of things I had to get done within a week due to personal reasons, they were very much accommodating and had completed the procedure within just 4-5 days completely, I'm very much thankful for them for being so understanding and through. Once again thank you.

It was a very excellent and painless treatment. Dr WAS VERY FRIENDLY. excellent consultant. Our family of 5 members are under the expert care & guidance of the dr.my paternal aunt's family is also under his care through our suggestion. They are also very much satisfied with the expertise of the dr.

The treatment here was very good..I learned a lot how to save my teeth from cavities and he ordered me a good toothbrush and a paste. I thank him for the continuous service given to me. For further treatment I will contact you.‚ò∫‚ò∫‚ò∫ once again thanking you..!!!

My sister suggested me this dentist. I felt comfortable When I visited his clinic, dentist was spend enough time listening to my problems. Then he explained what all possible remedies. He is very polite and very talented. Fees is also very nominal. I would recommend him.

I'm visiting this clinic for about 6 years since my braces treatment started . Both the doctors Dr.T.Elangovan and Dr.Navaneetha gave a polite and friendly treatment . I felt extremely comfortable on my every visit. My braces treatment has added beauty to my smile..

It was good. I felt nervous when I entered inside the  dentist's room but they made me comfortable by just asking about myself and then they asked what was the problem and when I told them they checked and told me that I have cavities in my teeth. Hearing that I was scared that whether they will take my teeth out but they said that just filling is required. And after filling was done I felt something strange but it is better now.
Thank you

I am been his patient for more than 10 years.

Time and again he proves his mettle, with virtue of high degree of professionalism, consideration of patients pain and need.

I would consider him as one of the best dentist in Chennai.

Will meet him soon for other RCs.

All the Best for his future endeavors.

A person with the cavity problem enters the doctor door the very first action will be taking x_ray. Here Dr. Elangovan was different and checked all the teeth and did treatment which shows his excellence. His assistant Dr. also kind and cooperative. Am very much satisfied by his treatment.

The best dentist our family has ever seen ...‚ò∫‚ò∫ as most of us are abroad he treats us according to our convenience... I have been under his treatment from childhood..I have been complimented for my smile always which is only and only because of him ... The best always...‚ò∫‚ò∫‚ò∫

One of my colleagues had suggested this clinic . If I recall correctly, I came in here to get my teeth cleaned and I went home with a wide smile(Clean teeth). The people were friendly and of course, The doctor. The process was completely pain free, the doc did a wonderful job and was done under 20mins. I would definitely recommend this clinic.

When we approached the doctor for my treatments.He gave me the appointment immediately. He started the treatment and asked me to do Root canal treatment and did on the same day.In the next appointment he took the measurements for the tooth capping. On the third appointment he finished tooth capping perfectly.‚ò∫

The dental treatment was carried out to suit to my convenient timings. Every time the appointment was confirmed by messages. It helped me a lot without any waiting time. I really feel very comfortable after the root canal procedure. I did not have the usual fear of root canal. It really went on well. Many thanks to D.T.Smile Care.

He is a great doctor.I initially had a fear about the procedure.But Dr Elangovan had explained about the treatment procedure and removed my fear and gained confidence on me.His approach and professional dedication is excellent.The service is marvellous here and I will certainly recommend him to others.I wish him and his team all the very best in their services.
N.Sivasubramanian
Advocate.

I have been coming for dental treatment for the last 10years excellent doctor. Very patient and hears all your problems . Gives correct advise and treatment. Never over prescribes any treatment. Even though I stay a bit far away I have never been to any other dentist. My parents are associated for the last 15 years. My personal experience and that of family is excellent.

Doctor had a gentle and calm manner of talking and handling the situation which made me feel comfortable.My fear for the root canal treatment was proven unnecessary as it was done with great care.
would definitely recommend him to others, and go back to him in the future incase of other dental problems.

review: The doctor listens to the problems patiently. *** *** ** ********* ** **** **** ***** He doesn't charge unnecessarily. I recommend him.Thank you.

Dr Elangovan greeted me with a smile as I entered the clinic.He was punctual. He explained to me clearly the nature of my problem. He made known to me how he would proceed with the treatment.He made me feel comfortable throughout,and created a climate of trust in the Doctor.The treatment was painless and I felt fresh even after the treatment. He also took time  to instruct me about the aftercare of the treatment.His assistants were polite and caring. The clinic was neat and clean.For me it was an anxiety free experience. The consultation was free, and the other fees was very nominal. I am grateful to the person who introduced me to this Dr Ilangovan.

This is my joy and honour to have  Dr. T. Elangovan  the processes we went through you had done  cleverly, that's really good job I appreciate you sir, there are thousands of people who really in need of proper care and compassion from Dr like you and we still look forward to your gifted hand, whenever and whatever pleased by men  God pleased the same I do believe that God will use you and help you to come up much more than your dream's. God wonderfully designed you for Him and for his people, helping other is helping your unseen God.
